name: Raffie (Alpha)
description:
A platform game where one has to traverse the landscape with cleverly placed platforms, platforms are limited and the game gets increasingly difficult. 

Raffie is the chosen one, sent through a quick "one size fits all" training, and now sees himself jumping through the wild crevasses trying to reach the next portal candle.

Please note the current version is an Alpha, expect huge changes.

Tweet suggestions to 

@se_bas5
